entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Doaktown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Doaktown 1:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: W 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
